item.title: By: katie
item.dc:creator: katie
item.description: Hey, that's on my porch! Where is the pic of me and Kristina?
item.content:encoded: Hey, that’s on my porch! Where is the pic of me and Kristina?

item.title: By: Daddyo
item.dc:creator: Daddyo
item.description: Too much sun, lobster foot!! Ever heard of sunblock? of course not--you're still young and don't think you can get cancer. Wait until you're hobbling around on your stumps from foot cancer.
item.content:encoded: Too much sun, lobster foot!! Ever heard of sunblock? of course not–you’re still young and don’t think you can get cancer. Wait until you’re hobbling around on your stumps from foot cancer.
